Question: Maxim Company (H.K.) Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Maxim Company (H.K.) Limited

Product: Maxim Company (H.K.) Limited CES 2024

- Maxim Company (H.K.) Limited is one of the 13 SMEs showcasing innovative products at the Design & Source in Westgate at CES 2024.
- The company will present a diverse range of offerings, including health monitoring wearables, smart living products, high-tech home appliances, car audio electronics, transmitter batteries, smart speakers for the hearing impaired, and cutting-edge Wrt-based networking devices.
Summary_cn:
香港明迪姆有限公司

产品：香港明迪姆有限公司CES 2024

- 香港明迪姆有限公司是CES 2024设计与采购活动中展示创新产品的13家中小企业之一。
- 公司将展示各种产品，包括健康监测可穿戴设备、智能生活产品、高科技家电、车载音频电子产品、发射器电池、面向听障人士的智能扬声器以及尖端Wrt技术的网络设备。
